pages: Habitat Stock Exchange News! Fall '87 AC                                        Populoplis, New Marin-                                                              All trading of Habitat stocks has   been suspended because of the infux of  humans into our world. The oracle has   pronounced that a NEW method of stock   & securities exchange will be           instigated "Whenever I am ready".                                                   Perhaps, with the humans among us,  the market will be stimulated. I know I am already!                                                                                Publisher, HSEN
